## Module.setMetadata() method

Set new metadata on the contract and return it if successful.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setMetadata(metadata: MetadataURIOrObject): Promise<ModuleMetadata>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  metadata | [MetadataURIOrObject](./sdk.metadatauriorobject.md) | The metadata to set. |
